Package project.data

Class Datasource

  • java.lang.Object
    • project.data.Datasource
  • public class Datasource
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for all connections and queries to the MySQL database.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
      Creates a query to insert a new appointment into the database, as well as adding that appointment to the ObservableList appointmentList for local access.
      static void addCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Creates a query to insert a new customer into the database, as well as adding that customer to the ObservableList customerList for local access.
      static void close()
      Closes the connection to the MySQL database.
      static void deleteAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
      Removes an appointment from the SQL database.
      static void deleteCustomer​(Customer customer)
      Removes a customer record from the SQL database.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentList()
      Retrieves the appointmentList.
      static Contact getContact​(int contactId)
      Retrieves a specific contact, by ID, from the local contactList.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Contact> getContactList()
      Retrieves the contactList.
      static Country getCountry​(int countryId)
      Retrieves a specific country, by ID, from the local countryList.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Country> getCountryList()
      Retrieves the countryList.
      static User getCurrentUser()
      Retrieves the current user of the application, if signed in.
      static Customer getCustomer​(int customerId)
      Retrieves a specific customer, by ID, from the local customerList.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getCustomerList()
      Retrieves the customerList.
      static Division getDivision​(int divisionId)
      Retrieves a specific division, by ID, from the local divisionListings.
      static java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,​javafx.collections.ObservableList<Division>> getDivisionListings()
      Retrieves the divisionListings.
      static User getUser​(int userId)
      Retrieves a specific user, by ID, from the local userList.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getUserList()
      Retrieves the userList.
      static void loadAppointmentList()
      Loads the ObservableList appointmentList with any appointments stored in the database for local access.
      static void loadContactList()
      Loads the ObservableList contactList with any contacts stored in the database for local access.
      static void loadCountryList()
      Loads the ObservableList countryList with any countries stored in the database for local access.
      static void loadCustomerList()
      Loads the ObservableList customerList with any customers stored in the database for local access.
      static void loadDivisionListings()
      Loads the HashTable divisionListings with lists of divisions by country for local access.
      static void loadUsers()
      Loads the ObservableList userList with any users stored in the database for local access.

      Takes a user's input and establishes whether those credentials fit a user stored in the database.

      Opens the connection to the MySQL database.

    • Method Detail

      • open

        public static boolean open()
        Opens the connection to the MySQL database.
        Returns:
        whether the connection was successfully established or not

      • close

        public static void close()
        Closes the connection to the MySQL database.

      • loadUsers

        public static void loadUsers()
        Loads the ObservableList userList with any users stored in the database for local access.

      • loginUser

        public static boolean loginUser​(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password)
        Takes a user's input and establishes whether those credentials fit a user stored in the database. If so, this will grant them access to the rest of the application.
        Parameters:
        username - - String : the input username
        password - - String : the input password
        Returns:
        whether login was successful

      • getUserList

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<User> getUserList()
        Retrieves the userList.
        Returns:
        the userList

      • getCurrentUser

        public static User getCurrentUser()
        Retrieves the current user of the application, if signed in.
        Returns:
        the current user

      • getUser

        public static User getUser​(int userId)
        Retrieves a specific user, by ID, from the local userList. If the ID is not found, returns null.
        Parameters:
        userId - - int : the user ID in question
        Returns:
        the retrieved user, or null

      • loadContactList

        public static void loadContactList()
        Loads the ObservableList contactList with any contacts stored in the database for local access.

        Returns:
